title: Stealing Scrap Metal With Angolan ShipWreckers
description:
If you’re struggling, consider therapy with our sponsor BetterHelp. Click
https://betterhelp.com/fearlessandfar for a 10% discount on your first month of therapy with a
licensed professional specific to your needs.

Angola is a country where very few dare to go. Over the past few videos we've been visiting the varios African tribes in the area. Now, we have a different adventure. But how do you find "off the beaten path" adventures anyway? You'll see a bit behind the scenes as we learn how to loot ships with Angolan ShipWreckers.

#fearlessandfar #angola #travel #adventure

Want the GPS pin of this adventure? Get my Map!
